QuestData.Title: Can of Critter Spray
QuestData.Description:
<Inside the wreckage of the robot, you find a sealed can of anti-critter spray.
Destroying all life, down to the rats, seems cruel but on par for King Mechagon.
Someone in Rustbolt might be able to provide additional insight.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Can of Critter Spray to Vera Lonelycog in Rustbolt on Mechagon Island.
